thread.title: Watch: Kate Winslet struggling to use an iPad is a beautiful thing

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: Watch: Kate Winslet struggling to use an iPad is a beautiful thing
text:
She have an Oscar under her belt but when it comes to technology, Kate Winslet is much less capable.
Winslet was on The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon last night and took part in a game of 'Photo Booth', which is basically using the photo booth app on an iPad to pull ridiculous faces and then the other person has to try and mimic it.
Not the best use of airtime but it gets a few laughs so we're sure Fallon is happy. And it gives us great insight into Winslet's inability to use an iPad or know what the hell she's doing while also showing off her skills in facial expression.
Via YouTube
